Open Source.This content management system helps local integration experts to provide multilingual information for newcomers.## TL;DR### PrerequisitesFollowing packages are required before installing the project (install them with your package manager):* python3.7* python3-pip* [PostgreSQL](https://www.postgresql.org/) database server* [Apache2](https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/2.2/howto/deployment/wsgi/modwsgi/) server with `mod_wsgi`### Installation```pip install integreat-cms```## DocumentationFor detailed instructions, tutorials and the source code reference have a look at our great documentation:https://digitalfabrik.github.io/integreat-cms/
